FuncDef: The display fei fe port mapping command displays interface index and chip number information of interfaces on a device panel. The display fei fe port mapping command displays interface index and chip number information of interfaces on a device panel.
CLIs: display fei fe port mapping slot <slotid>

ParaDef.Info:
Displays interface index and chip number information of all interfaces in a specified slot on a device panel.
The value must be set according to the device configuration.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display fei fe port mapping slot 1
